Class NavigationController

java.lang.Object
controller.NavigationController
public class NavigationController
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    NavigationController​(FrontController frontController)
    A controller used to navigate possible actions and send requests to the dispatcher

    • NavigationController

      public NavigationController​(FrontController frontController)
      A controller used to navigate possible actions and send requests to the dispatcher
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • createActionEntry

      public java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Runnable> createActionEntry​(java.lang.String actionName, java.lang.Runnable action)
      Create a log of the action taken by the user
      Parameters:
      actionName - String name of the action taken
      action - a Runnable object of the action taken
      Returns:
      a map formatted as , its type is

    • genericActionSelect

      public void genericActionSelect​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Runnable>> actions)
      Presents the possible actions to the viewer, then lets them choose one. Used for submenus.
      Parameters:
      actions - A mapping with the key as an Integer (the number for the action), and the value being another mapping where the key is a String (the name of the action) and the Value is a Runnable (the action itself).

    • mainActionSelect

      public void mainActionSelect()
      Presents the possible actions to the user, then lets them choose one. Used for the main menu.

    • adminActionSelect

      public void adminActionSelect()
      Presents the possible actions to the admin user, then lets them choose one. Used for AdminUsers only.

    • profileActionSelect

      public void profileActionSelect()
      Presents the possible actions to the user, then lets them choose one. Used for actions pertaining the user's profile.

    • walletSelect

      public void walletSelect()
      Presents the possible actions to the user, then lets them choose one. Used choosing or making a new wallet.

    • walletActionSelect

      public void walletActionSelect​(java.util.UUID walletID)
      Presents the possible actions to the user, then lets them choose one. Used for actions you can do to a specific wallet.
      Parameters:
      walletID - the UUID of the wallet that receives the actions.
